none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on July 12, 2024 Description from Terminal Escape:
 Absolte face melter from Berlin's DELTOIDS. It's hard to believe that a band can drop a recording that's this essential and then just drop out, but it seems like that's exactly what they did. I suppose if you're going to leave the world with six minutes of music then you might as well make then count, which is exactly what these cats did. So blast "Lab" all damn day and wish that you were one of the lucky ones who got to see DELTOIDS live. DELTOIDS

seo.title: Deltoids - Deltoids - Terminal Escape
